hero.title: International Tax, Visas, and LLC Formation Advisory
hero.subtitle: Our firm offers international tax advisory, visa services, and LLC formation. We are experts in tax planning, regulatory compliance, and corporate structures for digital businesses and nomads.

services.title: Comprehensive Solutions for Your Global Expansion
services.subtitle: From incorporating your company to international tax planning, we've got you covered.
services.service_residency_desc: We manage visas, residence permits, and optimize your tax situation as an expat or digital nomad.
service_residency_points: Digital Nomad Visa in Spain and other countries
services.service_incorporation_desc: We create the corporate structure that best suits your business, in Spain (SL) or the USA (LLC).
service_incorporation_points: LLC formation in the USA for non-residents
Limited Liability Company (SL) formation in Spain
Advice on choosing the optimal structure
services.service_tax_desc: We navigate the complexity of international taxation to minimize your tax burden and ensure compliance.
services.service_spain_fiscal_title: Fiscal and Accounting Management in Spain
services.service_spain_fiscal_desc: Comprehensive accounting, tax, and customs management services for freelancers and SMEs in Spain, specializing in the Canary Islands.
service_spain_fiscal_points: IGIC management in the Canary Islands
services.service_germany_desc: Specialized advice for logistics and transport companies operating or wanting to operate in Germany.
service_germany_points: Compliance with the supply chain act
Management of licenses and transport permits
services.service_insurance_desc: We help you find the perfect health and liability coverage for your life and business abroad.
service_insurance_points: Comparison of the best market options
services.service_work_germany_desc: We connect Spanish talent with German companies. Comprehensive process management.
service_work_germany_points: Legal contract and Social Security registration
Support with city registration and bank account
Continuous communication and support in your language

about.title: Your Strategic Partner in a Connected World
about.subtitle: Led by Ismael L., our international team demystifies tax and legal complexity so you can expand without borders.
about.paragraph1: In an interconnected world, proper tax and legal planning is not an option, it's a necessity. ConsultGlobalLex was born from the vision of offering highly specialized, accessible consulting adapted to the new digital economy. Our specialization in international tax advisory, visas, and LLC formation positions us as the agile and personalized alternative to large firms like Deloitte or CE Consulting.
about.paragraph2: Led by Ismael L., Consultant and CEO, our international team demystifies tax complexity for digital nomads, expats, and companies. We are not just advisors; we are strategists who understand the nuances of BEPS regulations, Beckham's Law, and double taxation.
about.experience_desc: We collaborate with a network of lawyers, customs agents, and consultants with decades of experience in international taxation, transfer pricing, and business expansion. This allows us to offer comprehensive solutions for LLC formation, compliance with regulations like Pillar Two and DAC7, and management of digital nomad visas, with a practical and efficient approach.
about.approach_desc: Our mission is to merge legal technology with strategic consulting so you can scale your business without borders. We offer a global perspective from our offices in the US and Spain, ensuring robust international tax planning and flawless execution to minimize risks and maximize your efficiency.

partners.title: Our Strategic Partners
partners.subtitle: We collaborate with a network of leading professionals to offer you a comprehensive and competitive service.
partners.insurance_desc: Thanks to our alliances, we guarantee you the best market conditions for a wide range of insurance: Home, Health, Vehicle, Life, Civil Liability, and Business. We compare and find the ideal option for you.

guides.title: Free Practical Guides
guides.subtitle: Download our exclusive resources and gain a competitive edge in the global market.
guides.visas_guide_desc: Everything you need to know about visas for digital nomads, investors, and professionals.
guides.sl_vs_llc_usa_desc: We analyze the tax and legal advantages of each structure so you can choose the best option.
guides.beps_guide_desc: Understand how new global tax regulations affect your digital business.
guides.tourism_license_desc: An indispensable guide for the management and tax optimization of tourist properties.
guides.germany_logistics_desc: Optimize your transport and logistics operations in the heart of Europe.

faq.title: We Answer Your Questions
faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions about Global Consulting
faq.description: Find quick answers to the most common queries about international taxation, global business law, and how we can help you.
faq.footer_text_after: for personalized advice on your specific case.

items.question: What services does Consult Globallex offer?
items.answer: International tax advisory for digital nomads and expats; formation and management of S.L. in Spain and LLC in the USA; BEPS compliance; visa management; accounting and tax consulting for SMEs and freelancers; strategic legal consulting; operations and logistics in Germany; and risk management and insurance.

items.question: How do I start working with you?
items.answer: Fill out the 'Book your 15' FREE mini-audit' form or write to us at info@consultgloballex.com. You will receive a personalized proposal in less than 24 hours.

items.question: What languages do you support?
items.answer: Spanish, English, and French, both in writing and via video call (Zoom, Teams) or email.

items.question: What is 'International Residency and Mobility'?
items.answer: We design and execute your strategy for changing tax and legal residency between jurisdictions, for digital nomads, investors, and professionals, with the least possible impact.

items.question: What visas do you handle?
items.answer:
– Visas for digital nomads and non-lucrative permits.
– Residencies by investment ('Golden Visa').
– Processing under Beckham's Law and other special regimes.

items.question: How do you optimize my 'tax-day'?
items.answer: We plan your key dates for tax residency and economic activity to minimize your tax bill without breaching regulations.

items.question: What is the process for a Golden Visa?
items.answer: We analyze your investment profile (real estate, funds, projects), prepare the documentation, and manage your application until residency is obtained.
